appSubtitle: Analyze, resize, and reformat your images with Gemini AI.
uploadPrompt: Drag & Drop or Click to Upload
generatingStatus: AI is working its magic... this may take a moment.
editPlaceholder: e.g., 'Make the text blue', 'Remove the logo in the top right corner'
error_missingImageOrFormat: Please upload an image and select at least one format.
error_someFailed: Some image formats could not be generated. Please try again.
error_editFailed: Failed to apply edits. Please try again.
prompt_outpainting_base: The provided image has a central subject on a black background (black bars). Your task is to perform an 'outpainting' to fill these black areas seamlessly. Use the Image Context provided to understand the style, lighting, and environment of the original subject. Extend the scene naturally into the black areas so no black borders remain.
edit_prompt_prefix: Based on the user's annotations on this image, please make the following adjustments
apiKeyRequiredBody: To use the advanced image generation features (Gemini 3 Pro), you must connect a Google Cloud project with billing enabled. This allows the AI to generate high-quality images.
